name: GoToMeeting
longDescription:
When you integrate GoToMeeting with Microsoft Teams, your meetings and calls will live where your team collaborates. Every tool has a purpose, and with the latest integration users can now maximize productivity by choosing the right meeting solution for the task at hand. Your organization may use Teams for file sharing, chat and small internal discussions. However, when it comes to important sessions with executives, customers, partners, analysts, investors & more, GoToMeeting ensures fast, high quality, and reliable large meetings for up to 250 people inside and outside your organization.

Please note that in order to use the GoToMeeting for Teams app, users must have an active GoToMeeting account. Please visit to [https://www.gotomeeting.com/](https://www.gotomeeting.com/) to find further information on how to get one.
For existing customers, please visit [https://support.goto.com/](https://support.goto.com/) for any required assistance.
shortDescription: You can easily start or join meetings within Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: GoToMeeting
localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Wenn Sie GoToMeeting in Microsoft Teams integrieren, finden Meetings und Anrufe dort statt, wo Ihr Team zusammenarbeitet. Jedes Tool ist für einen bestimmten Zweck optimiert, und mit der aktuellen Integration maximieren Sie Ihre Produktivität mit der jeweils optimalen Meeting-Lösung. Ihr Unternehmen setzt Teams möglicherweise schon für den Dateizugriff, Chats und kleinere interne Besprechungen ein. Wenn es jedoch um wichtige Sitzungen mit Führungskräften, Kunden, Partnern, Analysten, Investoren usw. geht, gewährleistet GoToMeeting schnelle, qualitativ hochwertige und zuverlässige große Meetings für bis zu 250 Personen innerhalb und außerhalb Ihres Unternehmens.

Bitte beachten Sie, dass für die Nutzung von GoToMeeting for Teams ein aktives GoToMeeting-Konto erforderlich ist. Unter [https://www.gotomeeting.com/](https://www.gotomeeting.com/) finden Sie weitere Informationen.
Sie sind schon Kunde? Unter [https://support.goto.com/](https://support.goto.com/) erhalten Sie Unterstützung.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Schnell und einfach in Microsoft Teams Meetings starten oder daran teilnehmen

localizedDefinitions.name: GoToMeeting

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Cuando integra GoToMeeting con Microsoft Teams, sus reuniones y llamadas estarán justo donde su equipo colabora. Todas las herramientas tienen una finalidad y, gracias a esta reciente integración, los usuarios pueden potenciar su productividad eligiendo la solución de reuniones adecuada para la tarea que están realizando. Sus organizaciones pueden usar Teams para compartir archivos, chats y debates internos ligeros. No obstante, cuando se trata de sesiones importantes con ejecutivos, clientes, socios, analistas, inversores y otros perfiles parecidos, GoToMeeting garantiza reuniones rápidas, de alta calidad y fiables para hasta 250 personas de su organización y externas.

Para usar la aplicación GoToMeeting for Teams, los usuarios deben tener una cuenta de GoToMeeting activa. Visite [https://www.gotomeeting.com/](https://www.gotomeeting.com/) para obtener más información sobre cómo conseguir una.
Los clientes existentes pueden visitar [https://support.goto.com/](https://support.goto.com/) para obtener la ayuda que precisan.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Puede iniciar reuniones o unirse a ellas fácilmente desde Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: GoToMeeting

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
En intégrant GoToMeeting avec Microsoft Teams, vous pouvez rapprocher vos appels et vos réunions du centre de collaboration de votre équipe. Chaque outil a son utilité, et avec cette dernière intégration les utilisateurs peuvent optimiser leur productivité en choisissant la solution de réunion adaptée à la tâche. Votre organisation peut utiliser Teams pour le partage de fichiers, le chat et les petites discussions internes. Mais pour des réunions plus importantes avec des cadres, des clients, des partenaires, des analystes, des investisseurs et autres , GoToMeeting permet des réunions rapides de grande qualité en toute fiabilité jusqu’à 250 personnes internes ou externes.

Veuillez noter que pour utiliser l’application GoToMeeting for Teams, les utilisateurs doivent avoir un compte GoToMeeting actif. Veuillez consulter [https://www.gotomeeting.com/](https://www.gotomeeting.com/) pour savoir comment en obtenir un.
Pour les client existants, veuillez consulter [https://support.goto.com/](https://support.goto.com/) pour obtenir de l’aide.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Vous pouvez facilement démarrer ou rejoindre des réunions dans Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: GoToMeeting

commands.description: Ottieni il collegamento alla tua riunione personale

commands.description: Ottieni il tuo personale collegamento alla riunione
commands.title: start

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Integrando GoToMeeting con Microsoft Teams, le tue riunioni e chiamate saranno il fulcro per la collaborazione del tuo team. Ogni strumento ha uno scopo, e l’integrazione più recente assicura la massima produttività degli utenti consentendo di scegliere la soluzione di riunione più adatta per le varie situazioni. La tua organizzazione può usare Teams per la condivisione di file, la chat e piccole conversazioni interne. Tuttavia, per le sessioni più importanti, con dirigenti, clienti, partner, analisti, investitori e altro, GoToMeeting consente di tenere riunioni rapide, di alta qualità e affidabili con fino a 250 partecipanti, sia interni che esterni alla tua organizzazione.

Ricorda che, per usare l’app GoToMeeting for Teams, gli utenti devono disporre di un account GoToMeeting attivo. Visita [https://www.gotomeeting.com/](https://www.gotomeeting.com/) per ulteriori informazioni su come ottenere un account.
Se sei già un cliente, visita [https://support.goto.com/](https://support.goto.com/) se hai bisogno di assistenza.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Puoi avviare riunioni o parteciparvi direttamente da Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: GoToMeeting

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Ao integrar o GoToMeeting com o Microsoft Teams, suas reuniões e chamadas serão feitas no mesmo lugar onde sua equipe já colabora. Toda ferramenta tem um propósito e, com essa nova integração, agora os usuários podem maximizar a produtividade escolhendo a solução de reuniões certa para a tarefa em questão. Sua organização pode usar o Teams para compartilhamento de arquivos, bate-papo e pequenas conversas internas. Entretanto, quando se trata de sessões importantes com o corpo executivo, clientes, parceiros, analistas, investidores e muitos outros, o GoToMeeting garante reuniões grandes, rápidas, de alta qualidade e confiáveis para até 250 pessoas de dentro e fora da organização.

É importante salientar que, para usar o aplicativo GoToMeeting for Teams, os usuários precisam ter uma conta ativa do GoToMeeting. Veja como obter uma conta em [https://www.gotomeeting.com/](https://www.gotomeeting.com/).
Os clientes existentes devem acessar [https://support.goto.com/](https://support.goto.com/) caso precisem de ajuda.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: É fácil iniciar ou ingressar em reuniões pelo Microsoft Teams

localizedDefinitions.name: GoToMeeting

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
将 GoToMeeting 与 Microsoft Teams 集成后，您的团队在哪里合作，您的会议和通话就可以在哪里进行。每一个工具都有自己的用途。通过这一最新集成，用户可以为手头的任务选择合适的解决方案来使工作效率最大化。您的组织可以通过 Teams 分享文件、聊天并展开小型的内部讨论。当涉及到与高管、客户、合作伙伴、分析师或投资者等人员的重要会议时，GoToMeeting 可为组织内外多达 250 人开展快速、优质和可靠的大型会议。

请注意，用户必须拥有已激活的 GoToMeeting 帐户才能使用 GoToMeeting for Teams 应用程序。关于帐户获取方式，请访问 [https://www.gotomeeting.com/](https://www.gotomeeting.com/) 了解详情。
现有客户如需要任何帮助，请访问 [https://support.goto.com/](https://support.goto.com/)。
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: 您可以在 Microsoft Teams 中轻松地启动或加入会议

examplePrompts.description: A user wants to start a new meeting immediately.
